root: ^Your path is blocked by a huge fallen tree, with dense bushes flanking the path you are on either side.

push: ^You start to push the tree aside, only to reveal the corpse of a poor soldier caught in the path of the giant fallen tree.
^The bony fingers of the unfortunate soldier still clutch a small metal case which seems largely undamaged, unlike everything else on the crushed corpse.
^(Gain a rare card) Take the case
over: ^You easily scale the large tree. Just as you are about to jump off  the other side you spot a massive boar near the roots of the tree.
^Fortunately, it does not seem to notice you, digging more of the roots free with its huge tusks.
around: ^As you start to move around the tree you hear an angry snorting behind you.
^Near the roots of the fallen tree stands a massive boar. It growls angrily at you before charging in your direction!
